mapper.sql: ID, AREAID, CELLNO, QTY, INOUTTYPE, TASKNO, CIGARETTECODE, CIGARETTENAME, CREATETIME, FINISHTIME, STATUS, BOXQTY, CIGARATTETYPE, CREATENAME,BARCODE
mapper.select:
select CIGARETTECODE, CIGARETTENAME,sum(qty)as QTY from T_WMS_STORAGEAREA_INOUT where status=20
and areaid=#{areaid}
and createtime <to_date(#{searchdate},'yyyy-MM-dd')+1
group by CIGARETTECODE, CIGARETTENAME order by CIGARETTENAME

select CELLNO,CIGARETTECODE, CIGARETTENAME,sum(qty)as QTY from T_WMS_STORAGEAREA_INOUT where status=20
and areaid=#{areaid}
and createtime <to_date(#{searchdate},'yyyy-MM-dd')+1
group by CELLNO,CIGARETTECODE, CIGARETTENAME order by CELLNO
mapper.insert: insert into T_WMS_STORAGEAREA_INOUT (ID, AREAID, CELLNO, QTY, INOUTTYPE, TASKNO, CIGARETTECODE, CIGARETTENAME, CREATETIME, FINISHTIME, STATUS, BOXQTY, CIGARATTETYPE, CREATENAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cellno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inouttype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cigarettecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cigarettename,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{boxqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cigarattetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createname,jdbcType=OTHER})

ID,
AREAID,

S_WMS_STORAGEAREA_INOUT.nextval,

mapper.update:
update T_WMS_STORAGEAREA_INOUT
AREAID = #{areaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CELLNO = #{cellno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INOUTTYPE = #{inouttype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TASKNO = #{taskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CIGARETTECODE = #{cigarettecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CIGARETTENAME = #{cigarettename,jdbcType=OTHER},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FINISHTIME = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BOXQTY = #{boxqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CIGARATTETYPE = #{cigarattetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=OTHER},
BARCODE = #{barcode,jdbcType=OTHER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_WMS_STORAGEAREA_INOUT set AREAID = #{areaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CELLNO = #{cellno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INOUTTYPE = #{inouttype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TASKNO = #{taskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CIGARETTECODE = #{cigarettecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CIGARETTENAME = #{cigarettename,jdbcType=OTHER}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FINISHTIME = #{finishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BOXQTY = #{boxqty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CIGARATTETYPE = #{cigarattetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=OTHER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
